Structs/PolarSensorSetting/SettingType.h.name: rangeMilliunit
Structs/PolarSensorSetting/SettingType.h.abstract: range with min and max allowed values

Protocols/PolarBleApiSdkModeFeatureObser.name: sdkModeFeatureAvailable(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApiSdkModeFeatureObser.abstract: sdk mode feature available in this device and ready for usage callback

Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceFeaturesObser.name: hrFeatureReady(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceFeaturesObser.abstract: Device HR feature is ready. HR transmission is starting in a short while.

Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceHrObserver.ht.name: hrValueReceived(_:data:)
Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceHrObserver.ht.abstract: HR notification received. Notice when using OH1 and PPI stream is started this callback will produce 0 hr.

Protocols/PolarBleApiPowerStateObserver..name: blePowerOff()
Protocols/PolarBleApiPowerStateObserver..abstract: Ble powered off event, no further actions are needed from the application.

Protocols/PolarBleApiObserver.html#/devi.name: deviceConnecting(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApiObserver.html#/devi.abstract: Callback when connection attempt is started to device

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/cleanup().name: cleanup()
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/cleanup().abstract: remove all known devices, which are not in use

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startAutoCon.name: startAutoConnectToDevice(_:service:polarDeviceType:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startAutoCon.abstract: Start connecting to a nearby device. PolarBleApiObservers polarDeviceConnected is

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/connectToDev.name: connectToDevice(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/connectToDev.abstract: Request a connection to a Polar device. Invokes PolarBleApiObservers polarDeviceConnected.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/setLocalTime.name: setLocalTime(_:time:zone:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/setLocalTime.abstract: Set local time to device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/getLocalTime.name: getLocalTime(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/getLocalTime.abstract: Get current time in device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature. Not supported by Polar H10.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startRecordi.name: startRecording(_:exerciseId:interval:sampleType:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startRecordi.abstract: Request start recording. Supported only by Polar H10. Requires polarFileTransfer feature.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/stopRecordin.name: stopRecording(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/stopRecordin.abstract: Request stop for current recording. Supported only by Polar H10. Requires polarFileTransfer feature.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/requestRecor.name: requestRecordingStatus(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/requestRecor.abstract: Request current recording status. Supported only by Polar H10. Requires polarFileTransfer feature.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/fetchStoredE.name: fetchStoredExerciseList(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/fetchStoredE.abstract: Api for fetching stored exercises list from Polar H10 device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature. This API is working for Polar OH1 and Polar Verity Sense devices too, however in those devices recording of exercise requires that sensor is registered to Polar Flow account.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/fetchExercis.name: fetchExercise(_:entry:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/fetchExercis.abstract: Api for fetching a single exercise from Polar H10 device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature. This API is working for Polar OH1 and Polar Verity Sense devices too, however in those devices recording of exercise requires that sensor is registered to Polar Flow account.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/removeExerci.name: removeExercise(_:entry:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/removeExerci.abstract: Api for removing single exercise from Polar H10 device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature. This API is working for Polar OH1 and Polar Verity Sense devices too, however in those devices recording of exercise requires that sensor is registered to Polar Flow account.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startListenF.name: startListenForPolarHrBroadcasts(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startListenF.abstract: Start listening to heart rate broadcasts from one or more Polar devices

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/requestStrea.name: requestStreamSettings(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/requestStrea.abstract: Request the stream settings available in current operation mode. This request shall be used before the stream is started

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/requestFullS.name: requestFullStreamSettings(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/requestFullS.abstract: Request full steam settings capabilities. The request returns the all capabilities of the requested streaming feature not limited by the current operation mode.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startEcgStre.name: startEcgStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startEcgStre.abstract: Start the ECG (Electrocardiography) stream. ECG stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startAccStre.name: startAccStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startAccStre.abstract: Start ACC (Accelerometer) stream. ACC stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startGyroStr.name: startGyroStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startGyroStr.abstract: Start Gyro stream. Gyro stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs during start or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startMagneto.name: startMagnetometerStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startMagneto.abstract: Start magnetometer stream. Magnetometer stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startOhrStre.name: startOhrStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startOhrStre.abstract: Start OHR (Optical heart rate) PPG (Photoplethysmography) stream. PPG stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startOhrPPIS.name: startOhrPPIStreaming(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/startOhrPPIS.abstract: Start OHR (Optical heart rate) PPI (Pulse to Pulse interval) stream.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/enableSDKMod.name: enableSDKMode(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/enableSDKMod.abstract: Enables SDK mode. In SDK mode the wider range of capabilities is available for the stream

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/disableSDKMo.name: disableSDKMode(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/disableSDKMo.abstract: Disables SDK mode. SDK mode is only supported by Polar Verity Sense (starting from firmware 1.1.5).

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/deviceInfoOb.name: deviceInfoObserver
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/deviceInfoOb.abstract: Device info observer for DIS (Device information service) and BAS (Battery service) GATT (Generic attributes) client

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/sdkModeFeatu.name: sdkModeFeatureObserver
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/sdkModeFeatu.abstract: SDK mode feature available in the device and ready observer

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/isBlePowered.name: isBlePowered
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/isBlePowered.abstract: Helper to check if Ble is currently powered

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/logger.name: logger
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/logger.abstract: optional logger set to get traces from sdk

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/automaticRec.name: automaticReconnection
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/automaticRec.abstract: optional disable or enable automatic reconnection, by default it is enabled

Enums/Features.html#/hr.name: hr
Enums/Features.html#/hr.abstract: hr feature enables hr client to receive hr and rr data from device

Enums/Features.html#/deviceInfo.name: deviceInfo
Enums/Features.html#/deviceInfo.abstract: deviceInfo enables dis client to receive fw information from device

Enums/Features.html#/batteryStatus.name: batteryStatus
Enums/Features.html#/batteryStatus.abstract: batteryStatus enables bas client to receive battery level info from device

Enums/Features.html#/polarSensorStreamin.name: polarSensorStreaming
Enums/Features.html#/polarSensorStreamin.abstract: polarSensorStreaming enables stream client to start acc, ppg, ecg, ppi streams

Enums/Features.html#/polarFileTransfer.name: polarFileTransfer
Enums/Features.html#/polarFileTransfer.abstract: polarFileTransfer enables the listing, read stored exercises and setup of local time to device.

Enums/SampleType.html#/hr.name: hr
Enums/SampleType.html#/hr.abstract: recording type to use is hr in BPM

Enums/SampleType.html#/rr.name: rr
Enums/SampleType.html#/rr.abstract: recording type to use is rr interval

Classes/PolarBleApiDefaultImpl.html#/pol.name: polarImplementation(_:features:)
Classes/PolarBleApiDefaultImpl.html#/pol.abstract: New instance of Polar Ble API implementation

Classes/PolarBleApiDefaultImpl.html.name: PolarBleApiDefaultImpl
Classes/PolarBleApiDefaultImpl.html.abstract: Class to provide the default implementation of the Polar Ble API

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
